entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.content:

In-App Purchases

  • Premium BundleÔºö‚Ç∫6.999,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫4.999,99 [‚Ç∫4.999,99 ~ ‚Ç∫6.999,99]

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫499,99

  • Premium BundleÔºö‚Ç∫4.999,99
  • 15M chipsÔºö‚Ç∫999,99

  • 5M chipsÔºö‚Ç∫499,99

  • Vault of chipsÔºö‚Ç∫4.999,99
  • 50M chipsÔºö‚Ç∫2.499,99
  • 100k chipsÔºö‚Ç∫149,99

Application Description

Bluff and raise, improve your skills, gain experience, make new friends and become the best poker player ever! ‚óÜ Game features ‚óÜ ‚Ä¢ FREE CHIPS ‚Äì Play the game every day to get free chips! ‚Ä¢ BOOST POKER TOURNAMENT ‚Äì A Texas Hold'em tournament where you spin the reel for a chance of winning 15 billion chips! Boost your balance with this incredibly exciting game! ‚Ä¢ SPECIAL MODES ‚Äì Play Texas Hold'em with a twist: make super combinations with jokers, peek at your opponent's cards, play high cards only, get pocket pairs and much more! ‚Ä¢ MTT TOURNAMENTS ‚Äì The most popular offline tournaments are now available online! Defeat lots of worthy competitors at several tables to reach the final table! ‚Ä¢ TOURNAMENTS¬†‚Äì Participate in weekly Sit'n'Go tournaments, where you can WIN unique trophies or millions of chips and top our Leaderboard! ‚Ä¢ CASINO GAMES ‚Äì Enjoy a variety of casino games. Play blackjack, Omaha poker, roulette, baccarat, slots, video poker, craps, Split Bet Poker and Set Poker‚Äîall in one application! ‚Ä¢ VIP LEVELS ‚Äì Get huge bonuses and exclusive access to the latest in-game features! ‚Ä¢ FAIR PLAY GUARANTEED¬†‚Äì All our games use a Random Number Generator (RNG) and are certified by independent experts. We guarantee the best and fairest Texas Hold'em experience! ‚Ä¢ CHAT WITH OTHER PLAYERS¬†‚Äì Have even more fun at the casino tables with our convenient in-game chat, instant messenger and animated emoji. Discuss the hands played or share your emotions with your poker opponents and friends! ‚Ä¢ REFERRAL SYSTEM ‚Äì Invite your friends to play, everyone will get a reward! ‚Ä¢ BUILD YOUR PROFILE ‚Äì Share your successes with friends. Show off how many games you've played, your biggest wins, level, card collections, achievements, property and trophies! ‚Ä¢ UNIQUE AVATAR ‚Äì Create a one-of-a-kind look in the avatar editor. ‚Ä¢ QUESTS ‚Äì Complete daily quests to get free chips! ‚Ä¢ EASY LEARN TO PLAY ‚Äì Are you new to Texas Hold'em poker but always wanted to try it? Our simple-to-follow tutorial mode will help you take the first steps. ‚Ä¢ NO REGISTRATION¬†‚Äì Get straight into the action. Choose guest mode to use our free casino app without registering. ‚Ä¢ SINGLE ACCOUNT¬†‚Äì Play on different devices. Choose the authorization method that works best for you and start playing Texas Hold'em poker right away for free! Subscribe to our social media pages and be the first to find out about our promotions and latest news! Facebook: https://facebook.com/Pokerist Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pokeristclub YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/KamaGamesChannel X: https://x.com/KamaCasino This game is only available to users of legal age. The game offers no possibility of winning money or anything of value. Success in playing this game does not imply your success in a similar real-money casino game.

Application Description

Get ready to jump into action and show the Kingdom who‚Äôs the real boss in the best tower defense game! Face empires of mighty enemies. Clash against supreme bosses, unlocking and switching to new towers. Train legendary heroes and get all the achievements using your strategy in this amazing TD game. Kingdom Rush Vengeance will give you hours and hours of gameplay in the best tower defense game available! Heroes, your Army, Enemies and legendary td bossfights! - 17 Powerful HEROES who will, without hesitation, rush into action at your command - LEVEL UP YOUR HEROES and upgrade their abilities - 10+ TRINKETS AND ARTEFACTS for that extra action in battle. - NEW POWERS AND REINFORCEMENTS to vanquish your foes, td style! - 30 UPGRADES to train your army to their best form. - 60+ DEADLY ENEMIES that will put all of your wit and strategic skills to the test - RUSH TO SAVE THE KINGDOM as you bring down 6 mighty bosses in the most legendary boss fights! Epic Selection of Towers and Upgrades - 22 NEW TOWERS to defend your kingdom - UNIQUE ABILITIES AND SPECIAL POWER for every tower - Choose your arsenal of towers and execute your strategy. Create devastating combinations of towers, abilities and special powers to stop your enemies! Near Endless Tower Defense Gameplay - 42 CHALLENGING STAGES that will test your skills - 9 DIFFERENT REALMS to conquer and explore - EXPLORE new lands in the Kingdom - 60+ ACHIEVEMENTS, hidden secrets, and fun stuff for you to play and discover while you explore the realm! - UNLOCK HEROIC AND IRON CHALLENGES on all stages - CASUAL, NORMAL, VETERAN OR IMPOSSIBLE difficulty for every level - Summon enemy waves faster to earn additional gold Time for some Royal Vengeance in the Kingdom! Vez‚Äônan, the powerful almighty wizard has returned. Lead your powerful dark army and make the Kingdom tremble with each step. Help Vez‚Äônan conquer new lands in the kingdom! Orcs, goblins, demons, dark knights, zombies and many more! Choose your favorites and mix them to find the most deadly tower defense combination - secure the crown of the kingdom for Vez‚Äônan. Awesome Offline Tower Defense Game No Wi-Fi at your Dark Tower? - PLAY ANYWHERE - playing offline works, if your wifi doesn‚Äôt - PLAY OFFLINE - no internet connection required - You can play Kingdom Rush Vengeance as your offline TD game of choice. -------------------------------------------------- HEARD ON THE MEDIA: "For veteran Kingdom Rush players and newcomers alike, the charm and strategy of the franchise remains with Kingdom Rush: Vengeance, making it one of the best mobile games of 2018!" -Polygon "Kingdom Rush Vengeance is the biggest and baddest the series has been." -148Apps "Players with any affinity for tower-defense games are going to enjoy every second they spend with Kingdom Rush Vengeance!" -Pocket gamer "The game is intensely engaging with a light-hearted tone that makes it a real pleasure to jump into." -Pocket tactics Get Lord Vez‚Äônan‚Äôs latest news here: https://www.kingdomrushvengeance.com/ Terms and Conditions: https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService Privacy Policy: https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy Video creators, podcast creators, and streamers: We would love to see your content on Youtube and Twitch! Application Description

Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action / bullet-hell roguelite where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 130 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with 13 unique characters! BALANCE RISK & REWARD Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 13 unique characters! BECOME OVERPOWERED Over 130 unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth! FIND SECRETS Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villain to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials! PLAY WITH FRIENDS Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours! Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫149,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫49,99 [‚Ç∫49,99 ~ ‚Ç∫149,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫49,99

Application Description

Featured by Apple on the US and Canada App Store. Enjoy a one-time purchase with lifetime access‚Äîno subscription required. EXIF Viewer by Fluntro is the ultimate tool for professional photographers and iPhone enthusiasts to view, manage, and edit EXIF metadata. With a sleek design and seamless functionality, this app offers a harmonious experience across all your iOS devices (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch). Key Features: ‚Ä¢ Remove EXIF Metadata and Geotagging: Safeguard your privacy by effortlessly deleting EXIF data, including GPS location. ‚Ä¢ View Detailed EXIF Data: Easily access essential metadata such as ISO, Shutter Speed, Focal Length, Camera Model, Lens Model, Timestamp and more from any photo on your device, iCloud, or Photo Stream. ‚Ä¢ Zoom in on Large Photos: Enjoy high-resolution images (up to 80 MB) with crystal clarity. ‚Ä¢ Customize Your EXIF Tags: Personalize your viewing experience by reordering EXIF tags, hiding unwanted tags, and selecting your preferred date format. ‚Ä¢ Quick Navigation: Smoothly swipe left or right to navigate between photos in the EXIF detail screen. ‚Ä¢ Map View: Visualize your photos on a map with detailed EXIF information accessible by tapping on each photo. ‚Ä¢ Bulk Edit EXIF Data: Efficiently modify EXIF metadata for multiple photos, including date and location changes. ‚Ä¢ Share Photos with or without EXIF: Seamlessly share photos via email, AirDrop, or other methods, with or without EXIF metadata. ‚Ä¢ Copy EXIF Data: Copy and share metadata across apps with ease. ‚Ä¢ Retain EXIF Metadata: Photos sent via Mail, AirDrop, or SD Card readers retain EXIF metadata, unlike most messaging and social networking apps. Additional Features: ‚Ä¢ 3D Touch Support: Quickly access actions like Favorites, Albums, or All Photos on supported iPhones. ‚Ä¢ Optimized for All iOS Devices: Compatible with iPad Pro, iPhone SE, iPhone 8, and newer models in both landscape and portrait modes. ‚Ä¢ Multiple Viewing Options: Choose from EXIF Cards List View, Grid View, or Map View to suit your preference. ‚Ä¢ Photos Extension: Access EXIF data directly within the native Photos app or third-party apps by selecting the photo and tapping the Share button to choose the EXIF Viewer extension. ‚Ä¢ iMessage App Support: Effortlessly view and share EXIF data in your messages. Editing and Removing EXIF Metadata: ‚Ä¢ Bulk Edit EXIF Data: Select multiple photos, tap ‚ÄúEdit EXIF,‚Äù and update metadata such as date and location. ‚Ä¢ Remove EXIF Metadata: 1. Overwrite the original photo to eliminate EXIF metadata. 2. Create a duplicate photo without EXIF data, with an option to delete the original photo. FAQ What is EXIF Metadata? EXIF stands for EXchangeable Image File Format. When you take pictures with your digital camera or phone, a considerable amount of EXIF data is recorded and stored within each image. This data includes information about your camera settings (ISO, focal length, image size, shutter speed, camera model, lens model, GPS), date, time, location, and more. Viewing EXIF metadata tags is crucial for both beginners and professional photographers to understand and review the camera settings or software used to create and edit a photo. Why Choose EXIF Viewer by Fluntro? ‚Ä¢ No In-App Purchases: Enjoy all current and future features with the initial purchase‚Äîno hidden costs. ‚Ä¢ Designed for Professional Photographers: Gain deep insights into your photography work and protect your privacy by removing sensitive metadata. ‚Ä¢ Privacy First: Your photos are securely stored locally on your phone and never uploaded to our servers. Learn more in our Privacy Policy. User Reviews: If you‚Äôre satisfied with the app, please consider leaving a 5-star review. Your feedback helps us improve and ensures the best experience for all users.

entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫799,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫449,99 [‚Ç∫449,99 ~ ‚Ç∫799,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

In-App Purchases

  • Custom Chord ProgressionsÔºö‚Ç∫299,99

Application Description

Solo is the ultimate practice App for mastering fretboard visualization, designed by world renowned guitarists Tom Quayle and David Beebee. Four powerful fretboard trainers allow you to work intuitively on each aspect of the visualization process; learning note names, memorising interval shapes, outlining chord changes, and practicing scales. Solo asks you to find intervallic functions against one root note, chord symbol or scale at a time, listens to the notes you play, and doesn‚Äôt move on until you‚Äôve correctly found each note by its intervallic function in the specified order. Practice with Solo and finally learn your note names, master interval shapes, confidently play through chord changes and break out of scale boxes with intervallic functions. Start transforming your playing and confidence on the fretboard today! NOTE TRAINER The Note Trainer is perfect for beginner and intermediate players getting to grips with note names on the neck - the foundation of solid fretboard knowledge. ‚Ä£ Solo shows you random root notes to find and listens, waiting for you to get it correct. ‚Ä£ Slide on the interactive fretboards for helpful diagrams and to study alternative options. Choose from 6 string guitar (standard and 4ths tuning), 7 string guitar, 4 string bass & 5 string bass. ‚Ä£ Optional practice suggestions offer challenging ways to limit and test yourself. ‚Ä£ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session. INTERVAL TRAINER The Interval Trainer will help players at all levels work on interval shapes with intervallic functions - the key to unlocking true freedom on the fretboard. ‚Ä£ Choose any combination of intervallic functions to practice. ‚Ä£ Create custom interval groups or choose the intervals for ANY chord type or scale. ‚Ä£ The Interval Trainer will randomise your chosen intervals and ask you to find them against either a fixed or random root note. ‚Ä£ Slide on the interactive fretboards for helpful diagrams, showing you where all of the interval shapes are across the neck, and to study alternative options. Choose from 6 string guitar (standard and 4ths tuning), 7 string guitar, 4 string bass & 5 string bass. ‚Ä£ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session. CHANGES TRAINER In the Changes Trainer you find intervallic functions, using single notes to outline different chord types or sets of chord changes, a key skill for learning to improvise through chord changes. ‚Ä£ Practice outlining intervallic functions through over 100 common chord progressions and single chord exercises. ‚Ä£ 50 intervallic function levels. Go from simple chord tones to complex melodic structures and scales. ‚Ä£ Solo intelligently maps out the correct intervals over each chord and listens for you to play each intervallic function in the specified order. ‚Ä£ Powerful workout options provide almost limitless ways to challenge yourself. ‚Ä£ Transpose the key of any progression or exercise. ‚Ä£ Choose to randomly transpose the progression (or single chord exercise) each time it repeats. ‚Ä£ Work on voice leading chord tones through single note lines. SCALE TRAINER The Scale Trainer contains a vast array of scales and powerful workout options, allowing you to finally break out of the box and develop a much deeper understanding of how scales are constructed on the fretboard. ‚Ä£ Practice finding scales on the fretboard using intervallic functions. ‚Ä£ Over 50+ Scales and modes. ‚Ä£ Powerful workout options provide almost limitless ways to challenge yourself. ‚Ä£ Melodic sequence options let you focus on starting from any chord tone within the scale. ‚Ä£ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session.

Application Description

Unlock your creative potential! Discover how to easily turn any Sun, Moon and Milky Way scene you imagine into a real picture‚Ä¶ and start shooting truly legendary photos every time you pick up the camera! Whether your passion is to capture beautiful landscapes, immortalize the infinite night sky, surprise the bride and the groom in their happiest day... or to travel the world, PhotoPills will make you love exploring new artistic possibilities to tell visual stories in a way it wasn‚Äôt possible before. * All in one app PhotoPills is your iPhone and iPad personal assistant in all photographic matters. It provides tasty remedies to answer most of the questions when planning and shooting your creative ideas: - The First 2D Map-Centric Planner: Sun, Moon, Milky Way - Sun, Moon Alignments Fast Finder - 3D Augmented Reality: Sun, Moon, Milky Way, Celestial Equator, Polaris, DoF, FoV - Photo Plans Manager - Location Scouting Tool - Key information: Sunrise/set, Twilights, Golden Hour, Blue Hour, Moonrise/set, Supermoon dates, Moon Calendar - Calculators: Long Exposure, Timelapse, Spot Stars, Star Trails, Hyperfocal Table, DoF, FoV - Widgets: Sun, Moon, Milky Way - PhotoPills Awards‚Ä¶ and much more! * Endorsed by Masters ‚ÄúPhotoPills is an invaluable tool which I use every time I plan a shoot.‚Äù ‚Äì Mark Gee, Astronomy Photographer of the Year. ‚ÄúA tool every photographer should have.‚Äù ‚Äì Kevin Raber, Luminous-landscape.com. ‚ÄúIt pays off! Using such a tool ensures that we are repeatedly capable of quickly planning powerful shots; leaving maximum opportunity for more creative ruminations.‚Äù ‚Äì Jos√© B. Ruiz, Innovation Award, Wildlife Photographer of the Year. * How it works Have you ever walked around a place and thought: "What a pity the Moon isn't EXACTLY right there... I would have captured a great photo!"? What about the Sun? And the Milky Way? Well, now you can let your imagination fly and calculate when this specific magic moment happens in just a few seconds: - IMAGINE: the Milky Way arching over a powerful landscape, a giant full Moon appearing from behind a nearby hill or a sunset between two rocks on a magic beach... The only limit is your imagination! - PLAN: easily calculate the exact date and time the scene you‚Äôve imagined happens. Work smarter, not harder! - SHOOT: just get out there, immerse yourself in the great outdoors, and enjoy living and capturing unique moments. * Become a Legend Because we know the huge amount of time, energy and love you put in your photos. We want to HONOR them, SHOW them to the World, and REWARD you with up to $6,600 in cash prizes. It's easy and FREE! Just submit your creative photos from PhotoPills and join the Legacy! * Never waste an unmissable scene again Create a To-Do list of planned photos and get to the location on time. * Get it right Adjust your frame for the best composition before you shoot. Use the 3D Augmented Reality Views to see whether Sun, Moon and Milky Way will be at the desired position when pressing the shutter. * Explore, discover great places and create your own database of locations If you come across a location you‚Äôd like to remember, save it as a Point of Interest. * Enjoy all daily information in just one swipe with the Widgets Just swipe down from the top of the screen to get all the Sun, Moon and Milky Way events for your current location and date, in addition to your upcoming photo plans. * Get more than an app Our goal is not only to help you plan your shots, but also to help you nail them. Whenever you need help, take a look at our How-To articles and videos, join our free online courses or just contact us! ‚ÄúThis is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back. You take the blue pill ‚Äì the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take PhotoPills ‚Äì you stay in Wonderland and we show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes. Remember: all we‚Äôre offering are Legendary Photos and Goosebumps in your skin, nothing more.‚Äù

Application Description

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

Take back control of your browsing experience. Trackless Links Pro is the universal Safari extension for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that removes tracking parameters, enables custom redirects, and gives you control over website behaviors. UNIVERSAL PURCHASE - ONE APP, ALL YOUR DEVICES Buy once and enjoy Trackless Links Pro on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your settings sync seamlessly via iCloud - start on your Mac and continue on your iPhone or iPad without missing a beat. WHAT IT DOES ‚Ä¢ Removes tracking parameters (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, etc.) before they follow you around ‚Ä¢ Custom redirects (e.g. reddit ‚Üí old.reddit) with plain text or regex patterns ‚Ä¢ Share Sheet integration - open links from any app to clean or archive them ‚Ä¢ Quick access to archived web pages via Wayback Machine and other services ‚Ä¢ Optional tweaks: stop autoplay, restore text selection, prevent exit popups, and more WHY IT'S USEFUL Cleaner links are easier to share. Redirects save time. Archive access finds cached versions of changed pages. Everything runs locally - no accounts, no data collection, no external services. TRACKING BLOCKER Removes common tracking parameters on the fly. Nothing leaves your devices. URL REDIRECTS Create and reorder custom rules. Includes 20+ predefined redirects focusing on privacy and alternative frontends (Reddit, Twitter/X, YouTube, Medium, and more). Disable or enable individually. Regex supported. SEARCH ARCHIVE One-tap access to cached web page snapshots via Wayback Machine. Access from the extension popup on any device. iCLOUD SYNC Keep settings synchronized across all devices. Filters, redirects, and tweaks sync automatically and immediately. Set it up once - your preferences follow you everywhere (statistics remain device-specific). BROWSER TWEAKS Selective opt-in controls: copy/select unlock, autoplay block, playback speed lock, PiP enable, URL clean-on-copy, redirector bypass, cookie banner suppression (experimental), dark mode, zoom limit removal, animation reduction, and more. Configure once, works everywhere. KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Universal Purchase - one price for iPhone, iPad, and Mac ‚Ä¢ Complete privacy - everything runs on your devices (zero data collection) ‚Ä¢ Native apps for iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with full feature parity ‚Ä¢ Seamless iCloud sync keeps everything synchronized automatically ‚Ä¢ Share from anywhere - open links from Reddit, X, and other apps ‚Ä¢ Fully customizable with personal filter and redirect rules ‚Ä¢ Advanced pattern matching with regex support for power users ‚Ä¢ Lightning-fast execution that loads before pages finish rendering ‚Ä¢ Ultra-lightweight with no battery drain or background activity ‚Ä¢ Works offline - no internet connection required DESIGN PRINCIPLES Plain language. User control. No dark patterns. Opt-in for anything that might change page behavior. One purchase, all platforms. IMPORTANT NOTES Tweaks may not work on all websites due to varying designs and security policies. All tweaks can be disabled if they cause issues. Cookie banner management is experimental. SUPPORT & FEEDBACK Bug reports and feature requests: https://github.com/aloth/trackless-links/issues PRIVACY No tracking, analytics, remote calls, or data retention. Everything runs on-device. EULA Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ READY FOR CLEANER BROWSING EVERYWHERE? Download Trackless Links Pro - fast, private, and on your terms.

entry.content:

Application Description

A remodeled 2D take on the fourth game in the world-renowned FINAL FANTASY series! Enjoy the timeless story told through charming retro graphics. All the magic of the original, with improved ease of play. The Kingdom of Baron sent their elite airship fleet, the Red Wings, to attack the surrounding countries. Distressed by his mission, Cecil, a dark knight and captain of the Red Wings, decides to fight against the tyrannical Baron with his trusted friend and his paramour at his side. In his search for the crystals, Cecil must travel over land, under the ground, to the Land of Summons, and even to the moon. Join forces with Kain the dragoon, Rosa the white mage, Rydia the summoner, and many more skilled allies. FFIV is the first title to introduce the dynamic "Active Time Battle" system, where time moves even during battle, giving the players an exciting sense of urgency.Thanks to the wide appeal of the game, this revolutionary system would be implemented in many future titles in the series. Witness the dramatic story and dynamic battles in this fourth installment of the FINAL FANTASY series! ----------------------------------------------------------------------- ‚ñ† Beautifully revived with new graphics and sound! „ÉªUniversally updated 2D pixel graphics, including the iconic FINAL FANTASY character pixel designs created by Kazuko Shibuya, the original artist and current collaborator. „ÉªBeautifully rearranged soundtrack in a faithful FINAL FANTASY style, overseen by original composer Nobuo Uematsu. ‚ñ†Improved gameplay! „ÉªIncluding modernized UI, auto-battle options, and more. „ÉªAlso supports game pad controls, making it possible to play using a dedicated gamepad UI when connecting a gamepad to your device. „ÉªSwitch the soundtrack between the rearranged version, created for the pixel remaster, or the original version, capturing the sound of the original game. „ÉªNow possible to switch between different fonts, including the default font and a pixel-based font based on the atmosphere of the original game. „ÉªAdditional boost features to expand gameplay options, including switching off random encounters and adjusting experience gained multipliers between 0 and 4. „ÉªDive into the world of the game with supplemental extras like the bestiary, illustration gallery, and music player. *One-time purchase. The app will not require any additional payments to play through the game after the initial purchase and subsequent download. *This remaster is based on the original "FINAL FANTASY IV" game released in 1991. Features and/or content may differ from previously rereleased versions of the game. Shooting Classic provides beautifully rendered skeuomorphic cameras that transform your experience as you swipe through lenses, flashes, and films. ‚ñ† Use Multiple Exposure to shoot multiple images in one shot and get amazing artistic results ‚ñ† ‚Äî PRO CAMERA For the mobile photographer looking for a minimal capture interface with maximum control, shooting Pro gives you ultimate creative control. ‚ñ† Manually control focus, white balance, exposure, shutter speed, ISO, and aspect ratio ‚ñ† ‚Äî DARKROOM EDITING SUITE A full editing suite including over 20 professional adjustment tools and 12 signature presets. ‚Ä¢ Classic Lens, Film, and Flash ‚Ä¢ Crop ‚Ä¢ Straighten & Rotate ‚Ä¢ Skew ‚Ä¢ Exposure ‚Ä¢ Clarity ‚Ä¢ Definition ‚Ä¢ Exposure ‚Ä¢ Clarity ‚Ä¢ Definition ‚Ä¢ Highlights ‚Ä¢ Shadows ‚Ä¢ Vibrancy ‚Ä¢ Fade ‚Ä¢ Curves (RGB + Red + Green + Blue) ‚Ä¢ Temperature ‚Ä¢ Tint ‚Ä¢ Depth of field ‚Ä¢ Texture ‚Ä¢ Grain ‚Ä¢ Vignette ‚Ä¢ Before & After view by holding down image in edit view ‚Ä¢¬†Undo & Redo by swiping left and right ‚ñ† Choose the overall mood of your image with Hipstamatic's signature Lenses, Films, and Flashes, then fine tune with extensive editing tools ‚ñ† ‚Äî FAVORITE PRESETS Create your own Favorite Presets and even share your signature look with others. Tap on any photo to instantly edit it, and see and organize your photos in either Hipstamatic or Apple Photos. ‚Ä¢ Runs natively on iPhone and iPad ‚Ä¢ No need to import, just tap and edit ‚Ä¢ Quickly Favorite or Delete photos ‚Ä¢ Always full resolution ‚Ä¢ Save as Separate Files (default) and keep your originals untouched ‚Ä¢¬†Save as non-destructive Versions and streamline your photos with the original safely embedded within the Hipstamatic version (works best with iCloud Photo Library) ‚Ä¢ Browse folders created in the Photos app ‚Ä¢ Fully synchronized with Photos app and iCloud Photo Library ‚Ä¢ View detailed metadata ‚Ä¢ View shared image details across social networks (likes, comments, etc.) ‚Ä¢¬†Capture and edit in RAW format ‚ñ† Shoot on iPhone and edit on iPad with fully native support and synchronized Favorite Presets via iCloud ‚ñ† ‚Äî HipstaMart‚Ñ¢ Shop Browse amazing filter packs available for purchase via the In-App store created by the world‚Äôs most talented photo makers. entry.title: Aiko
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫1.199,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫999,99 [‚Ç∫999,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.199,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫999,99

Application Description

High-quality on-device transcription. Easily convert speech to text from meetings, lectures, and more. The transcription is powered by OpenAI's Whisper running locally on your device. Nothing leaves your device. You can export the transcription as subtitles too. It has a word-replacement feature to let you automatically fix common mistakes. Aiko favors accuracy over speed. It does not do live transcription while recording. It does not currently have speaker detection. Try the trial first. See website. Note: Sharing from Voice Memos on iOS 26 does not work because of a iOS 26 bug outside of my control. Supports audio in 100 different languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Bashkir, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Breton, Bulgarian, Burmese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Faroese, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hawaiian, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Marathi, Mongolian, MƒÅori, Nepali, Norwegian, Norwegian Nynorsk, Occitan, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Sanskrit, Serbian, Shona, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Tibetan, Turkish, Turkmen, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Yiddish, Yoruba The app was made possible thanks to Whisper by OpenAI and whisper.cpp by Georgi Gerganov. ‚ñ† FAQ ‚Ä£ Can I edit the text in the app? I don't plan to support any editing. Export the transcription and edit it in a proper text editor. ‚Ä£ Why is the app so large? The app delivers the highest quality transcription on the market for 100 different languages. Rather than asking why it's so large, the real question is how is it so small. ‚Ä£ Why is the transcription so slow? The app favors accuracy over speed. However, performance is expected to improve in the coming months. ‚Ä£ Why must I keep the iOS app open while it transcribes? iOS apps are fundamentally restricted from operating in the background for extended periods. ‚Ä£ Can I delete some of the languages to save space? This is unfortunately not possible. The model has all the languages stored together in a way that makes it impossible to remove just some languages. More FAQs on the website. ‚ñ† Technical details The app uses the Whisper medium or small model on iOS depending on available memory and the large v3 model on macOS. ‚ñ† Privacy The transcription is done locally on your device. Nothing leaves your device. ‚ñ† Support You can contact me through the feedback button in the app.

Application Description

In this spectacular game of colossal fun, reveal numbers one-by-one and close a corresponding square on one of your cards. Your goal is to score as many points as possible, and you'll do that mostly by crossing off the nine numbers printed in a 3x3 grid. Get three-in-a-row to unlock bonuses, which can help you close more squares and trigger even more bonuses. Use Lightning tokens to nudge numbers to your liking, but don‚Äôt forget about Moon tokens to avoid an end-game penalty. At the end of a round, you score points for each card that you've completely marked off, with the points diminishing each round from 15 in round one to 8 in round four. After four rounds, you score 1 point for each two spaces Xed on unfinished cards. Together with your points from completed cards, stars and moons, this determines your total score. The App offers you weekly single-user challenges in 3 game modes with varying degrees of randomness, so you can compete with players from all over the world in the highscore lists. But of course you also can just play for yourself and collec tg various achievements. Awards 2022 Tric Trac Nominee 2022 Mensa Recommended 2021 Cardboard Republic Socializer Laurel Nominee

entry.title: This Is the Police
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫54,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫5,00 [‚Ç∫5,00 ~ ‚Ç∫54,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫5,00

Application Description

Dive into a deep story of corruption, crime and intrigue. Take the role of gritty Police Chief Jack Boyd, and come face to face with the ugly underbelly of Freeburg, a city spiraling the drain. Will Jack reach his retirement with a nice stack of bills, or will he end up broken ... or worse? Manage your staff, respond to emergencies, and investigate crimes in a city on the brink of chaos. The mafia underworld maneuvers behind the scenes, sinking their claws ever deeper into the city, even as the mayor is ready to exploit every situation to his political advantage. Choose your approach to each situation as it unfolds. Sometimes you‚Äôll be responding to a developing crisis at a crime scene, or negotiating with Freeburg‚Äôs crime bosses. Sometimes you‚Äôll find yourself dodging questions in the press room, or even the occasional cross-examination in the witness box. Can you keep this pressure cooker from exploding, at least for long enough to stash away a nice retirement nest egg? - Your mission is clear: make $500,000 in 180 days before Jack Boyd reaches retirement. How? That‚Äôs up to you! - Decisions, decisions! This Is the Police is all about a dark story and how you react to it. Whatever you decide, your choices will influence the game ‚Äì and the fate of Jack Boyd. - The Good, the Bad, and... the Ugly? The Chief of Freeburg's Police Department deals with all kind of people. It is up to you to find the bad guys and decide how to deal with them. - Carry out your duties. As head of Freeburg PD, Jack deals with all sorts of challenges every day: responding to emergencies, managing his officers, defending the department against City Hall and a corrupt mayor, and much more. - Solve Investigations and gather evidence against the criminal gangs of Freeburg. - Deal with the competing powers of the city. Everyone offers you favors, and each one comes at a price. Rich and fully voiced story: Jack Boyd is portrayed by Jon St. John, the voice of Duke Nukem.

entry.content:

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode. The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched. Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support. Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data. Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!
